Title: Remove product from cart
Precondition:
User is logged in (if required)
Product ID 10 is already added to cart
Steps:
1. Go to "Cart" page
2. Locate product with ID = 10
3. Click on "Delete" button next to the product
4. Observe that the product disappears
5. Verify that total price is updated
6. If cart becomes empty, check for "No items in cart" message
Expected Result:
Product is removed from cart
Total price is recalculated correctly
"No items in cart" message appears if cart is empty
TestData:
Product ID: 10
Product Name: Wireless Mouse
Price: $15.00
Quantity: 1
Actual Result:
Product disappeared from the cart immediately after deletion
Total amount updated accurately after product was removed
Message “No items in cart” appeared clearly at the center of the page
